subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The 17th stage of the Tour de France features one of the most daunting mountains in all of cycling: the 3,576-foot climb to L’Alpe D’Huez with an average slop of 7.9 percent.
snippet: The 17th stage of the Tour de France features one of the most daunting mountains in all of cycling: the 3,576-foot climb to L’Alpe D’Huez with an average slop of 7.9 percent.
